title: Value & Benefits
text: Learn how Oh My Receipt! can help you stay organised with your receipts.

section.title: Snap or Select
section.content: Whether you're snapping a fresh receipt or selecting one from your gallery, 'Oh My Receipt!' ensures quick and secure saving to the database.

section.title: PDF Conversion On-the-Go
section.content: Making a claim? Easily convert your stored receipts into PDF format, making the submission process more convenient than ever.
